title: Someone is playing games on my PBE account.
body: They changed my PBE account's E-Mail, without me ever getting anything to verify the change, and today they changed the summoner name, and have been playing games on it. The password is still the same. I sent an account recovery form, but was wondering how long that'd take, and if it would be possible to freeze the account in the meantime. Summoner name is now L1DR.

replies.body: Our account recovery queue may take a few moments, but they'll be able to help!  If you have a ticket number I'd be happy to check on your status!

The request number is #25484403
Thanks for the fast reply.

Happy to help!  Your ticket was received yesterday and escalated to our account recovery team.  I don't have an eta, but an account recovery specialist will be investigate your specific case, and reaching out to you as soon as they can.  Hang on until then!
